DOC.brief_summary: Warfighters often experience physical overload , uniform associate gear carry burden substantial load . The loads increase energy expenditure level exceed Warfighter 's typical energy intake . The typical assault load approximately 25 kg , although load high 55 kg often carry , combine extreme energy expenditure degrade health performance , increase risk injury . Branched-chain amino acid ( leucine ) supplementation may confer protection negative effect operational stress stimulate muscle protein synthesis reduce degradation . This study determine leucine-enriched nutrition supplementation confers protection negative consequence sustain load carriage exercise , explore mechanism leucine might impart protection .
DOC.brief_title: Skeletal Muscle Response Amino Acids Load Carriage Exercise
DOC.criteria: Weight stable ( ±5 lbs ) body mass index 2229 kg/m2 VO2peak 40 60 ml/kg/min Willing refrain take NSAIDS ( i.e. , aspirin , Advil® , Aleve® , Naprosyn® ) , aspirincontaining product , alchohol , nicotine Females must oral contraception Metabolic cardiovascular abnormality , gastrointestinal disorder Disease medication affect macronutrient metabolism ability participate strenuous exercise Allergies intolerance food ( e.g . lactose intolerance/milk allergy ) , vegetarian practice , medication ( include , limited , lidocaine phenylalanine ) use study Anemia ( HCT < 38 ) Sickle Cell Anemia/Trait , abnormal PT/PTT test problem blood clot Present condition alcoholism , use nutritional/sports supplement , anabolic steroid , substance abuse issue Musculoskeletal injury compromise ability exercise Blood donation within 8 week enrollment Pregnancy woman oral contraceptive
